notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Eleh bene ha-ne῾orim אלה בני הנעורים
He῾arot ῾al sefer ha-Torah ṿeha-pilosofiah הערות על ספר התורה והפילוסופיה
Igeret bene Mosheh אגרת בני משה

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian cursive script of the 19th century. Joseph Almanzi: inscribed, e.g., folio 1r.

binding.p: Post-1600. Ivory vellum, with a strap. Initials G.B. on the upper cover. Boxed. Spine: 'E. & I. Luzzatto. Poems, Etc. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,004.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 115: his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum: inscribed, folio [90v] (fse001v).
